verbs.description: [ARG1: Kim ’s trip] [V: follows] [ARG2: his groundbreaking summit with President Donald Trump in Singapore last week that resulted in a surprise announcement of a U.S. suspension of military drills with its South Korean ally] .

Kim ’s trip follows [ARG1: his groundbreaking summit with President Donald Trump in Singapore last week] [R-ARG1: that] [V: resulted] [ARG2: in a surprise announcement of a U.S. suspension of military drills with its South Korean ally] .
